text: what began as an American crisis in the

loss of confidence amongst European

from investors have confidence in

banks to lend money to each other on
Tuesday finance ministers from 15
different European Union countries tried
to come up with a coordinated
european-wide policy the best they could
do however was a set of general
guidelines meant to coordinate between
the different national capitals but each
country will continue to pursue its own
